meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Planned Development District No. 655, on the southwest corner of Potters House Way and Truth Drive.

agenda_items.description: An application for the amendment to and renewal of Specific Use Permit No. 1981 for a bar, lounge, or tavern.
